Newspaper: I would read newspapers, either physical copies or online versions, to stay informed about current events.
Social Media: I would use social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram to follow news sources and get updates on breaking news.
Podcasts: I would listen to news-related podcasts to get in-depth coverage of specific topics or events.
Email Newsletters: I would subscribe to email newsletters from reputable news sources to receive daily updates and analysis.
Community Meetings: I would attend local community meetings or events to stay informed about local news and developments.
